casebody.data:
HAHN COAL COMPANY v. Guy T. HEL-VERING, Commissioner of Internal Revenue. No. 1062. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. March 21, 1934. Hodges, Wilson & Rogers, of Denver, Colo., for petitioner. Robert H. Jackson, Gen. Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and Mc-DERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petition dismissed on motion of petitioner.
